section.name: Lightsource
section.definition: This section contains keywords to describe the actual settings of a light source used for stimulation or excitation.

property.name: InventoryNo
property.definition: The inventory number of the device.

property.name: Model
property.definition: The model name of this hardware item.

property.name: Manufacturer
property.definition: The Manufacturer of this hardware item.

property.name: Owner
property.definition: Who's the owner of the device.

property.name: Type
property.value: [LED, Laser, Mercury Arc, Halogen Lamp, Xenon Lamp]
property.definition: The type of light source used.

property.name: PulseWidth
property.definition: The width of the laser pulse.

property.name: PulseRate
property.definition: The frequency with which laser pulses are delivered.

property.name: Wavelength
property.definition: The wavelength of the emitted light.

property.name: WavelengthLowerBound
property.definition: The lower bound of the output spectrum.

property.name: WavelengthUpperBound
property.definition: The upper bound of the output spectrum.

property.name: Intensity
property.definition: The output intensity of the light source.

property.name: Description
property.definition: A description of this hardware item.
